Message:
As I gazed down
at the village below
from the old castle window,
a maid standing
behind me spoke.

“Lady Carmilla,
it appears you skipped
your studies again today.”

We are a clan of vampires
who drain the life force
of those we touch.

We are born from our mothers’
corpses after stealing their
life force while inside the womb.

“Either way,
I’m just going to stay cooped up
in this castle my whole life,
all to hide what I really am.”

The maid didn’t respond
to my bitter words.
Instead, she just bowed
gracefully as she always does.

Eating normal food
fills our stomachs,
but it doesn’t
quench our thirst.

Letting out a small sigh,
I glanced down once more
at the village below.
